sentences.sContent: the areas affected by the hurricane
a disease that affects the central nervous system
sentences.sCn: 影响中枢神经系统的疾病

sentences.sContent: Trading has been adversely affected by the downturn in consumer spending.
sentences.sCn: 贸易受到消费支出回落的不利影响。

sentences.sContent: We were all deeply affected by her death.
sentences.sCn: 我们都为她的去世深感悲痛。

sentences.sContent: The condition affects one in five women.
sentences.sCn: 每五个妇女就有一个人患有这种病。

words.tran: 受到影响的；做作的；假装的
令人感动地；令人伤心地
影响；假装；使…感动（affect的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to do something that produces an effect or change in something or in someone’s situation
